room_title: Escape room "Merlin's Secret Chamber" by Headcase Escape Adventures in Pigeon Forge
room_description: Princess Adelina has been turned to stone. The great and powerful wizard Merlin tried to intervene but was overpowered in the struggle and thrown into a deep slumber. Time is running out. You must enter Merlin's chamber, collect the orbs, conquer Hildegard and rescue Princess Adelina before the spell becomes permanent.
